The Corpse Vanishes (1942) is a public domain American horror mystery directed by Wallace Fox and starring Bela Lugosi in one of his chilling mid-career performances. This restored and colorized edition brings new life to a cult horror classic from Monogram Pictures, allowing modern audiences across the United States, Europe, and beyond to experience the eerie suspense of 1940s low-budget Gothic cinema with fresh vibrancy.

Plot Summary:
A series of mysterious deaths occurs when young brides collapse at the altar on their wedding day. Their bodies, strangely preserved with no signs of decay, are secretly stolen by a sinister scientist, Dr. Lorenz (Bela Lugosi). Obsessed with preserving the beauty of his aging wife, Countess Lorenz (Elizabeth Russell), the doctor extracts fluids from the bodies of these young women to keep her youth intact. Reporter Patricia Hunter (Luana Walters), suspicious of the bizarre events, investigates the case. Her search leads her to the Lorenz mansion, where she discovers a twisted world of corruption, obsession, and macabre science. With the help of her colleague and a determined sense of justice, Patricia risks her life to expose Lorenz‚Äôs monstrous crimes before more innocent lives are taken.

sources.title: The Corpse Vanishes (1942) Bela Lugosi Horror, Sci Fi
sources.description: Dr. George Lorenz (Bela Lugosi) and his wife (Elizabeth Russell) are getting on in years, but they've thought of a way to thwart aging. Lorenz abducts a nubile bride-to-be, Alice (Joan Barclay), and plans to extract her valuable bodily fluids to inject into his wife, restoring her health and vitalit y. Journalist Patricia Hunter (Luana Walters) is investigating the case of the missing bride, but, when the trail leads her to Lorenz, she doesn't realize she's in danger of becoming his next victim.

sources.description:
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Luana Walters, Tristram Coffin
Director: Wallace Fox

A scientist, aided by an old hag & her two sons - a malicious dwarf and a brutish moron, kills virgin brides, steals their bodies, & extracts gland fluid to keep his ancient wife alive and young.

metadata.Plot: Dr. Lorenz, a mad scientist, wants to keep his elderly wife young. He does this by kidnapping young females and extracting fluid from them. He then injects this fluid into his wife.
